articles.title: Country celebrates Eidul Azha today with call for unity, selflessness
articles.description: PM Shehbaz calls for remembering Palestinians "enduring ruthless and inhumane oppression and hunger".
articles.content:

articles.title: June's full 'Strawberry Moon' illuminates the night sky next week: Here's how to see it
articles.description: Don't miss the 2025 full "Strawberry Moon" when it rises above the southeastern horizon on June 10.
articles.content:
This month's full "Strawberry Moon" graces the night sky on June 11, putting on a spectacular show as the fully-lit disk of Earth's natural satellite rides low over the southeastern horizon.

articles.title: Sharks suffer 40-10 defeat in the Shire as Warriors surge into top two
articles.description: Cronulla are struggling for form at the mid-point of the season, after suffering a 30-point defeat to the Warriors on Saturday night.
articles.content:

Maybe this really could be the year of the New Zealand Warriors.
Coach Andrew Webster’s men completely outplayed Cronulla on Saturday night to triumph 40-10.
